title: Apple smashes its all-time record with 74.5m iPhone sales | Trusted Reviews
description: ![iPhone6]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * The quarterly performance puts Apple in great shape for the forthcoming monthswhen it will finally release the [AppleWatch](https://www.trustedreviews.com/apple-watch-review) and perhaps a new12-inch MacBook Air with a Retina Display.
